instruction: Come up with a job for a robot designed to help during emergencies.
output: The robot would be designed to help evacuate people quickly and efficiently during emergencies, such as fires, floods, or other disasters. It would be able to detect and avoid obstacles, open doors, carry injured people, and deliver first aid supplies. It should also be able to communicate with rescue workers, as well as map out safe paths to evacuate people. Additionally, the robot should have live-streaming capabilities to help people in remote locations keep up with evacuations in near real-time.
